item.title: Educating looked after young people: Aspire Scotland
item.description: IW - Ian Watson FS - Francis Scott PN - Paul Neilson IW Aspire provides high quality residential care and education for children and young people aged between 8 and 17. Aspire Education is based in Kilbirnie, Ayrshire, in a converted cinema which is also home to a number of community facilities including a cafe, gym and games hall to which the school has access. In fact these facilities play an important part in the education programme - helping the young people integrate with the local community and learning about trust and respect.
